channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-14373] PerformanceEvaluation tool should support huge number of rows beyond int range
item.description:
We have test tool “org.apache.hadoop.hbase.PerformanceEvaluation” to evaluate HBase performance and scalability.

Suppose this script is executed as below,

hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.PerformanceEvaluation --presplit=120 --rows=10000000 randomWrite 500

Here total 500 clients and each clients have 10000000 rows.

As per the code,


opts.totalRows = opts.perClientRunRows * opts.numClientThreads

optt.totalRows is int, so 10000000*500 will be out of range.
item.summary: PerformanceEvaluation tool should support huge number of rows beyond int range

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
This issue is duplicated with HBASE-13319.
There was a patch in HBASE-13319. Maybe we push that issue?
Thanks Liu Shaohui, I will close this JIRA as duplicate of HBASE-13319.
